text: Grant Denyer (born 12 September 1977) is an Australian television presenter and former motor racing driver. He is best known for being the former weather presenter of the Seven Network breakfast television program Sunrise. He is currently the host of Deal or No Deal on Channel 10. Denyer was born Coffs Harbour, New South Wales. He is married to television producer Cheryl Rogers. They have one daughter, Sailor (born 2011). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Australian television presenters Category:Meteorologists Category:People from New South Wales
title: Grant Denyer
